definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
marquis, second of the five orders of ancient Chinese nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/nobleman or high official
to get a monkey to perform tricks/to put on a monkey show/to make fun of sb/to tease
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
long time off/time that will never come
lit. to kill a chicken in front of a monkey; fig. to make an example of sb (by punishment) to frighten others
lit. killing the chicken to scare the monkey (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres

sentences.english: The research was conducted in rhesus monkeys, which are considered an excellent model of human drug users.
sentences.chinese: 研究所用的恆河猴被認爲是人類藥癮者的良好模型。

sentences.english: A female monkey gives birth to a little monkey in the vage of lab.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室的小籠中一隻母猴生下了小猴。

sentences.english: This guy looked like a beaten-up spider-monkey mutant.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙看起來活像個蓬頭垢面的蜘蛛猴變種人。

sentences.english: On the Monkey Mountain the monkeys frolicked and played happily, which attracted the eyes of many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 猴山上猴子們歡鬧玩耍，吸引不少遊客的目光。

sentences.english: Other people like fish, caged birds, tortoises and even snakes, monkeys or lions.
sentences.chinese: 另一些喜歡魚，鳥，龜甚至蛇，猴和獅子。

sentences.english: Objective The regulation of hormonal secretion in dispersed Leydig cell of rhesus monkey.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究恆河猴睾丸的激素分泌及其調節作用。

sentences.english: This is the only home of the red Colobus monkey but there are very few left.
sentences.chinese: 這是紅色疣猴的唯一棲息地，但是現在所剩無幾了。

sentences.english: The researchers studied the behaviour of female brown capuchin monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員研究了雌性僧帽猴的行爲舉動。

sentences.english: In the marmoset kitchen, Peter prepares the monkeys' daily menu.
sentences.chinese: 彼得在廚房中爲絨猴準備喫的。

sentences.english: They had not been seen alive by scientists since 1921.
sentences.chinese: 從1921年起，科學家們就沒見到過存活的眼鏡猴。

sentences.english: Mr. White saved the paw from fire and wanted to have three wishes.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生不顧朋友的警告，拿過了猴爪想許三個願望。

sentences.english: In Africa, people who got the smallpox vaccine in the past had a lower risk of monkeypox.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，以前得過猴痘的人患猴痘的風險較低。

sentences.english: Good luck in the year of the monkey, happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 好運在猴年，快樂過元旦。

sentences.english: What's your malfunction you fat barrel of monkey-spunk?
sentences.chinese: 犯什麼病了，你個瘋猴似的肥桶？

sentences.english: The little monkey has a long tail.
sentences.chinese: 這隻小猴有一條長尾巴。

sentences.english: Don't come on so strong in the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 不要一開始就急猴猴的。

definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
